name: 1001 Jigsaw. Cute Cats 2
description:
Already a favorite puzzle from the series of games "1001 Jigsaw. Cute Cats 2." Adorable and clumsy kittens will cheer you up!

The game is easy to control, so you can adjust the level of difficulty, use hints or take a break. All results are saved. We have thought about every detail to make it comfortable to play as a beginner and true masters of the genre.

Funny, cute and beautiful cats are ready to make your day a little better!

- 500 high quality pictures
- Sophisticated game mode: easy tips, sorting and a magnifier
- Individual difficulty settings for each puzzle allow you to play ad infinitum
- feature to turn off the rotation mode of puzzle pieces
- the ability to save and continue a puzzle at any time
- For those who like excitement - special tasks and colorful trophies
- pleasant relaxing music
- new part in the series of games
